Articles.Content:
After playing career with spud a little, i think i will never use mk-1 again.

Hahaha I have a hard time going back as well. I'm more than a little biased though.

Is the spud... ... ... backwards? I feel like it's backwards.

Doing my usual gravity turn the viewports are facing toward KSC, where the MK1 lander can's viewport faces the water.

Or am I crazy? =P

Either way I LOVE both of these.

Is the spud... ... ... backwards? I feel like it's backwards.

Doing my usual gravity turn the viewports are facing toward KSC, where the MK1 lander can's viewport faces the water.

Or am I crazy? =P

Either way I LOVE both of these.

definitely backwards, it even spawns backwards in theVAB when you place it

Amazing models, but the spud is definitely really annoying to use because it's backwards

I'll check it out ASAP. I fly almost purely by navball and nobody seemed to notice in the test phase. Lol funny thing is I've landed this thing on Mun and Minmus in IVA mode and never noticed... Just watched the instruments and glanced out window to check that the terrain was flat. Now that you've brought it up I'm pretty sure you're right though.
Awesome new addition!!!

I'll check it out ASAP. I fly almost purely by navball and nobody seemed to notice in the test phase. Lol funny thing is I've landed this thing on Mun and Minmus in IVA mode and never noticed... Just watched the instruments and glanced out window to check that the terrain was flat. Now that you've brought it up I'm pretty sure you're right though.

hope you change it man, I love stockalike models and these are some of my favorites so far

hope you change it man, I love stockalike models and these are some of my favorites so far

It should be an easy fix. I have things set up well in unity, so a quick rotation of the scenes and we should be good to go. I won't be able to check it out till later, like after 9pm California time though.
OK, the spud should be all fixed now. As always back up your saves before updating.
Nice. ^^ Thanks for the fast turnaround.

Nice. ^^ Thanks for the fast turnaround.

Turnaround! I don't know if you meant it that way but I love puns. It's a bad habit I know.

Jebediah sent me a text yesterday asking me to let you know he's loving every minute in space sitting comfy in your lovely creation!

Included: Pic of a very happy Jeb on the Mun.

Thanks for the pods man, they're the best

~snip~

Jebediah sent me a text yesterday asking me to let you know he's loving every minute in space sitting comfy in your lovely creation!

Included: Pic of a very happy Jeb on the Mun.

Thanks for the pods man, they're the best

Nice pic I like how Kerbin is "sneaking" over the edge there
Appearantly planets also like to photobomb, who knew!?
I'm just curious what mod that tank is from, or if it's just been retextured with Kerbpaint.

I'm just curious what mod that tank is from, or if it's just been retextured with Kerbpaint.

It is the CASTOR like texture from HERE

Turnaround! I don't know if you meant it that way but I love puns. It's a bad habit I know.

LAWL. Did not notice that actually. =P
I am forever in your debt for this command pod, Orionkermin. It's exactly what I've been wanting for a very long time.

Wow, love the spherical pod.

Going to try this right now!

The mini MFD's need some kind of transfer panel, like orbiters transx. Would be so cool if you could do precise missions entirely from the cockpit.

This mod is what I have been waiting for since 0.9, thank you!

The mini MFD's need some kind of transfer panel, like orbiters transx. Would be so cool if you could do precise missions entirely from the cockpit.

This mod is what I have been waiting for since 0.9, thank you!

Well go suggest that on the RPM thread By the way there is already an orbital display of the body your orbiting in RPM and showing the trajecotry to another planet is already planned

Well go suggest that on the RPM thread By the way there is already an orbital display of the body your orbiting in RPM and showing the trajecotry to another planet is already planned

oops, I didn't notice that this was a separate mod. It's till awesome, I love using the spherical pod.
These are pretty awesome. I especially like the spherical pod, and the way it attaches seamlessly to other parts. Looks great! Can't wait to see what you get up to next.
Anybody up for some winged-gemini-inspired shenanigans?
Ha how well did it fly? I tried this once back before the last major update to the radish. It didn't go well...

It glides surprisingly well. The only problem is that the front skid explodes on landing, so I had to enable "No crash damage" and "Unbreakable joints". I just wish the devs added smaller landing gear...
